questions.question: What should you do to enable a SageMaker training job to access S3 resources in a secure manner?
options: Assign an appropriate IAM role to the SageMaker instance.
Provide the job with an IAM user's access key and secret key.
Disable VPC access for the training job.
Use S3 bucket policies only for access control.
correct_answers: Assign an appropriate IAM role to the SageMaker instance.
